title: Bug 122105 - Schema not added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using stored procedure
description: Bug 122105 - The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure.
OB: In the 'Edit Data Set' window, when dragging a stored procedure to the Query Text, the observed behavior is that the stored procedure naming does not include the database schema name.
EB: The expected behavior is that the stored procedure naming should be composed of the database schema name and the stored procedure name.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report.
2. In the 'Edit Data Set' window, drag a stored procedure to the Query Text.
